About me

A long time gamer, tech enthusiast, and friend. I work with integrity and honesty. Asking the right questions is my greatest skill to get to desired solutions. Always willing to improve myself and help others.

Just beware be ready for jokes.

View Resume

Projects

Network Tool

A personal project to make network troubleshooting commands easily accessible in a UI for Windows. Built in Visual Studio Blend with C# and WPF. Useful experience in making a reliable tool with a clean UI; once I figured out how to pull data from the Network Interface Controller!

GitHub

Gaming Team Site

A trip back in time to when I developed and administered a website for the gaming team I led. With a 4 decade age range on the roster, and multiple cultures, I had the pleasure of organizing our talented team. My first foray into a building a homepage with an embedded custom Adobe Flash Player, and a phpBB3 forum board to boot!

Sorry, this lost relic has no hyperlinks!

Gradient Picker

HTML, CSS, and Javascript coming together in a glorious harmony to show off some DOM manipulation. Built as an exercise during my Full Stack Web Development course taken from Zero To Mastery.
